name: e.l.f. Instant Lift Waterproof Brow Pencil, Long-Lasting Eyebrow Pencil For Grooming & Shaping Brows, Vegan & Cruelty-free, Blonde
short_description: HIGH-PIGMENT, WATERPROOF BROW PENCIL: Shape, fill and define your natural brows for a look that stays put—rain or shine! e.l.f. Cosmetics Instant Lift Waterproof Brow Pencil delivers rich, smudge-resistant pigment.

FOR PRECISE APPLICATION: The e.l.f. Instant Lift Waterproof Brow Pencil is dual-sided and features a precision tip, allowing you to fill in sparse areas or create bold definition with the smooth, creamy formula.
CREATES A NATURAL-LOOKING FINISH: The spoolie end grooms and shapes brow hairs for a natural-looking finish.
AVAILABLE IN SIX SHADES: Available in six high-pigment shades.

SKIN-LOVING INGREDIENTS: All e.l.f. products are made from skin-loving ingredients you want, minus the toxins you don’t—all at good-for-you prices. All e.l.f. products are 100% cruelty-free and Vegan.

name: Rimmel London Brow This Way Professional Eyebrow Pencil, Long-Wearing, Highly-Pigmented, Built-In Brush, 004, Black Brown, 0.05oz
short_description: Built-in brush.
Long-lasting color that won’t fade or smudge.
Pigmented formula.
6 shades to suit virtually every brow.
product_description: Turn up the brow wow! The Rimmel Brow This Way Professional Eyebrow Pencil is an iconic brow tool: an eyebrow pencil with a built-in brush. First, use the brush to tame and sweep your brows into place. Then fill and shape your arches using the long-wearing smudge-proof Rimmel eyebrow pencil. For the most natural eyebrow look, it’s best to use short strokes – by flicking upwards you can create the look of tiny brow hairs. Then your arches are on point with the ideal eyebrow tint! With 6 shades, there’s now a fabulous color fit for virtually every brow.
